title: How to Draw a Baseball Cap

steps.headline: Begin by drawing a semicircle.
steps.description: This will be the part of the hat that will rest on your head.

steps.headline: Add the visor.
steps.description: To do so, first draw a rectangle, then add a small triangle beneath it. Also draw a small half-oval on top of the semicircle you drew in step one.

steps.headline: Add the curves for the cap.
steps.description: This includes the curve of the visors and the division of the base (see image).

steps.headline: Draw a semi oval.
steps.description: Do this at the right side of the hemisphere. Draw a curved line over the narrow part of the semi oval.

steps.headline: Outline the shape of the hat over the sketch.
Line the drawing with a black liner.
steps.description: Erase the pencil and add in color.

text: Steps Begin by drawing a semicircle. This will be the part of the hat that will rest on your head. Add the visor. To do so, first draw a rectangle, then add a small triangle beneath it. Also draw a small half-oval on top of the semicircle you drew in step one. Add the curves for the cap. This includes the curve of the visors and the division of the base (see image). Ink the drawing. Erase the sketch. Color and shade the drawing. You're done! Using an Alternate Method Start by drawing a hemisphere.  Draw a semi oval. Do this at the right side of the hemisphere. Draw a curved line over the narrow part of the semi oval. Outline the shape of the hat over the sketch.  Erase the sketch carefully. Add in details. Line the drawing with a black liner. Erase the pencil and add in color.
